metadata.title: CVE-2021-47616 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: RDMA:Fix use-after-free in rxe_queue_cleanup On error handling path inrxe_qp_from_init() qp->sq.queue is freed and then rxe_create_qp() will droplast reference to this object. qp clean up function will try to free thisqueue one time and it causes UAF bug. Fix it by zeroing queue pointer afterfreeing queue in rxe_qp_from_init().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
